document_data.name: Ahmadora
document_data.mainbody: '''Ahmadora''' was a young girl living in [[Easthaven]] during the 11th century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The blond haired lady liked to wear blue dresses.
document_data.Personality: Ahmadora was an fearful young girl who scare about some of the animals found in the [[Frozenfar]].
document_data.Activities: Unlike many kids in the small community, Ahmadora was fascinated by magic and loved to see spells cast by [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Relationships: Ahmadora was friends with a few other local children, like [[Dillsandra]], [[Jeffy]], and [[Chizelo]].
document_data.History: In [[Eleint]], [[1281 DR]], Ahmadora and a few other children met a group of mercenaries who decided to head with [[Hrothgar]] on his expedition to [[Kuldahar]].
